body.name: Colorlizard 39" Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote, Cellphone Tripod Stand, 6 in 1 Wireless Bluetooth Portable Selfie Stick for iOS & Android Devices for iPhone, Travel Accessories.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 2 mins
features: 📸【Extra Tall 43" & Broader View】This 2022 new-upgraded selfie stick tripod is equipped with 6-section adjustable rods, from 10" to 43". So, it enables you to capture broader views while recording or taking pictures easily, and meet the needs of people who want to have different shoot heights. ★ equipped with 1 x 1/4" screw adapter (work with gopro, webcam and more devices) Perfect for selfies, vlogs, live streaming, group photos, etc.

📸【More Stable & Large Tripod Base】This phone selfie stick has a large 10.6" tripod base with 3 non-slip silicone pads on the feet, which makes the structure more stable, windproof, and shockproof. No more worrying about your phone falling from the tripod. Also, the handle of phone tripod adopts a streamlined design with a matte texture to increase the comfort of use.

📸【Unique 360°Rotation Design】This bluetooth selfie stick is designed with 270°Neck rotation and 360°head rotation, you can find the best photo angle easily by simply rotating the angle. Suit for the width of 2.3"-3.6" cell phones. Compatible with IOS/Android, such as iPhone 13 pro max/iPhone 13/iPhone 12/12 Pro Max, iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, iPhone X/XS/XS Max/XR, Samsung Galaxy S10/S9/S8, Huawei P40/P30/Mate 40/Mate 30 and more.

📸【Detachable Remote Shutter】The selfie stick tripod, with the most advanced chips, is equipped with a detachable, one-button shooting, bluetooth wireless remote, and connection distance of up to 10m. No need to ask anyone for help, you can record exciting moments anytime and anywhere. Great gift for live streamer, interviewer, youtuber, tiktok creator, vlogger, blogger, and other video recording lovers.

📸【2-IN-1 Phone Tripod Stand】2-IN-1 phone tripod can be used as both a selfie stick and a stand for phones. Easily switch between 2 modes, bringing the best photography results for multi-scene applications. After folding only 12", weight 370g! Take it Anywhere, whenever you want to record a beautiful moment, it always is there. ★2 years warranty, any questions, contact us we will help to solve them asap within 24h.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CAPTURE DELIGHT WITH COLORLIZARD Product: 43" Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod for Smartphone (Black) Colorlizard aims to bring you a professional shooting experience. This selfie stick with bluetooth remote is perfect for anyone who loves recording their life. It is made of Stainless steel, which is durable and lightweight. The foldable mini size allows you to carry it anywhere in your pocket or bag. It can be used as a selfie stick or turned into a phone tripod for different shooting needs.

BLUETOOTH REMOTE Magnetic attached15 meters connection distanceOne-Click Shooting STURDY TRIPOD Made with premium Stainless steelEasy to open/closeStable & NO wobble ADJUSTABLE BRACKET 180° Angle AdjustNon-Slip Rubber keeps the phone stable while rotating

FLEXIBLE ROTATION 360° Rotated Phone Clipeasily switch between horizontal and vertical filming MULTIFUNCTIONAL DESIGN Extend up to 43 inchesFoldable design handheld selfie stick for wide angle filming PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT Easy to put in pockets and bagsEasily held with one handWon't burden your luggage when traveling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great i use it alot when we travel. Only thing is I lost the clicker for it, now I just have to see if they just sell those, but other than that I really like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Bluetooth note is extremely handy and also the way it folds together and the remote attaches to it it is very compatible and fits in a small purse even would buy again it is a awesome product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use…
reviews.reviewText: This actually would have been a five star review. This item works very well. It holds the phone securely in any of the positions. The Bluetooth hooks up super easy. The only thing that I was not pleased with, is the overall construction; It is a bit fragile. Just be careful with it and it will do a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this. Holds my phone even when my phone is in its case. Easy to use. Great way to watch my shows and do videos with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stand for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This stand was sturdy, fit my Pixel 6 pro just fine, and offered a decent range of motion and angles. Plus it folds up super compactly, it barely took up any space at all in my suitcase and it's super lightweight. Very happy I ended up with this stand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to attach
reviews.reviewText: Very hard to open the clamps and get the phone in. When the phone is in, it holds it very securely. And then it's hard to get the phone out again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing. Works great and is compact to pack up. The only thing better would be an automatic motion sensor to follow us as we move. But that would make it much more expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For sure the pictures don't show how big and good this piece is, I've studied a bit the listing before ordering, but this one is just something else!So this is a really big and long one, I got the 160cm version and it's one of the biggest I've ever had to try.It's folding pretty well, vreu compact comparing to how it looks unexpanded. The handle is thick and quite big, not very comfortable for a girl's small hand, instead with a bit of strength while using, this one can produce really good pictures or video.The Tri leg stand is big and pretty stable for those 160cm it is while in a vertical position. Because of the strong base it god that big and thick handle which is actually dividing into 3 parts.The stick itself is strong and may bend a bit if with a phone on the other end and held from the handle, fully expanded.The phone holder is big and good with the inside area padded with some foam to hold the phone better. The holder can be removed and instead a 1/4in socket to mount any kind of camera there.I am really impressed, had a big fun using it from drone-like videos as it's really long.For sure I do recommend it, it's a very good piece for a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this is a versatile little bugger.it makes for a good selfie stick that has a nice and long collapsable arm. the tripod legs extend from handle and provide a solid base.the remote is ok, i've had it a few meters away with no issues, but i've had no need to try at any further distance.this is an all round good little piece of kit that is worthy of its £29.99 (atow), price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first thing that caught my attention was the length - at 160cm, it's much longer than any other selfie stick I've used before. The 160cm length is perfect for getting groups of people in the frame and the extra length comes in handy when using the integrated tripod stand. It can film me seated when placed on the floor and also works when I am standing at full height. The stick is very comfortable to hold in normal use and the Bluetooth remote control that clips into the handle of the unit is a great addition. It pairs easily with my phone via Bluetooth and makes taking pictures and videos a breeze. The button can be removed and used as a remote control when I am using the tripod mode, or I can leave it attached to the handle for selfies. It's cleverly designed and very user-friendly.The unit comes with a universal phone holder, making it compatible with most smartphones, including my iPhone 13 Pro Max, which is held very securely in place， and the ability to rotate it into landscape or portrait mode is a nice touch. the handle has a matte texture which increases friction and prevents slipping, making it easy to hold onto. However, the handle of the stick may be too thick for some people, especially women. Additionally, when using it outdoors, the length of the stick can cause it to sway in the wind, slightly reducing stability.With a discount coupon, the actual price of 24.99， That's a pretty reasonable price for this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tripod or selfie stick ,small but it extend long enough for all the needsGood for taking pictures ,the best pictures are the ones I am taking myself as I can try as many times I need without getting stressed that the photographer might loose his patience .Usually my ‘photographer ‘ is my husband and he is not good at this at all.With this selfie tripod everything is much easier.It gets really compact ,so it can be easily carried in my day to day bag .I like the system of opening ,initially I did not know how to operate it ,but reading through the instruction ,everything seemed much easier.Once opened it feels pretty sturdy .The only down side is a the length .When used as a selfie stick the length size is more than ok ,but for tripod usage I find it a bit short which makes it a bit tricky when you need to take photos of yourself standing :)The remote has a good signal and is easy to use .Space saving for being so compact and money saving for being versatile !Great deal !
